name: df-bits
body: |- wceq(cbits, cmpt(s0, cz, crab(s1, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(cv(s0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))))))))
comment: Define the binary bits of an integer. The expression ` M e. ( bits `` N ) ` means that the ` M ` -th bit of ` N ` is 1 (and its negation means the bit is 0). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.)
